entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Freezing rain mixed with rain early this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
